step-1.title: Personal information
step-1.text: RocketRoute would like to give you the best product. This survey will take few seconds

step-2.title: Address
step-2.text: We need your address to confirm our best offer

finish.title: Finish
finish.text: Thanks for your answers. We will get back to you within 24 hours with our amazing product
